CustomField.formula: Annual_HOA_Fee__c + Annual_Managment_Fee__c + Vacancy_Repairs__c + Maintenance_Repairs__c + (Monthly_Taxes__c*12) + (Monthly_Insurance__c*12) + Annual_Landscaping_Expense__c + Owner_Paid_Utilities__c + Other_Expenses__c + Credit_Loss__c + ( IF ( Verified_Rent__c > 0 , Verified_Rent__c * 12, Monthly_Rent__c * 12 ) * 30 )
CustomField.label: Annual Total Expenses
